attributes.action: Increase minimum wage to 10£/hour as key workers have served during covid
attributes.additional_details: To appreciate the effort of key workers as they have been out risking their lives during this covid crisis serving the country as their duty
attributes.background: Increase minimum wage as key workers deserve the pay hike as they served the country during covid and it's not increasing enough to appreciate their efforts.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/558514
